job.title: Salesforce Informatica Data Engineer
job.description:
Summary

The Salesforce Informatica Data Engineer will design intelligent, automated data integrations. Bring high-performance, zero code, cloud, and on-prem data integration to scale.

DUTIES
  • Design intelligent, automated data integrations
  • Bring high-performance, zero code, cloud, and on-premises data integration to scale
  • By scaling up the data ecosystem around Salesforce, we will improve speed and lower the total cost of ownership with data integration
  • Implement scalable solutions that handle large amounts of data through ETL migration, integration, and implementation of user-friendly interfaces leveraging Salesforce adaptors and secure agent deployments
  • You will improve business process agility and outcomes, drive innovation, and reduce time to market for our innovative IT solutions
  • You will work closely with Salesforce Administrators and Developers
  • You will also be engaged in our strategic project integrations
REQUIREMENTS
  • Bachelor’s Degree
  • 6 year’s relevant professional experience
  • 3 years of recent Informatica Cloud, ETL, and Salesforce / Informatica integrations experience
  • Certifications in Salesforce and Informatica preferred
